about_the_game:
The old king, after enduring countless hardships, managed to preserve the spark of rebirth for the kingdom amidst the disaster. Now, this flame is entrusted to you.

A new kingdom is born after the catastrophe. As a successor, how will you lead your kingdom to establish itself on this land shrouded in clouds and fog?

Exploring the Land:

No one knows what lies beneath the fog. Sometimes, relying on luck is not a bad option. Rationally resolve the various events shrouded in fog, expand the kingdom's dominion, and increase its influence to become the master of this continent.

Worker Placement:

As a king, allocate each of your workers wisely; they are the foundation of your kingdom. Among your workers, some fortunate ones can obtain resources directly from the wild, but do not rely on them too heavily. The campfires left behind by the workers are a powerful weapon against the fog, yet they are powerless against the cold winter.

Building Construction:

Constructing buildings is the most stable way to acquire resources, accumulating small amounts over time. However, the type of building depends solely on the resources available on the land.

Connecting Roads:

To prosper, one must first build roads. Buildings linked by roads will see a significant increase in production efficiency. Planning the roads within your kingdom wisely is the key to prosperity.

Monster Nests:

Beneath the fog, there are not only the subjects who were scattered in the early years but also countless monsters. Lead your army to clear these nests in time to prevent it from being too late.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4790 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-13600KF CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: After a catastrophic disaster, the land has been divided into countless small pieces by clouds and fog. Lead your kingdom, allocate your workers wisely, build various structures to gather resources, construct roads to connect your buildings, and rebuild your home!
